name: Applied Data Science
body: Projects and assignment completed for course taught by [Regina Dolgoarshinnykh](http://www.stat.columbia.edu/~regina/). Textbook followed: [The Elements of  Statistical Learning:  Data Mining, Inference, and Prediction.](http://statweb.stanford.edu/~tibs/ElemStatLearn/)
